About Me

Let me tell you about me...

Junior Front-End Developer

A creative, innovative and comprehensive Junior Front-End web developer equipped with several years IT experience in the government sector as well as corporate environment. A seasoned software developer who can utilize web and app applications to create client-centered solutions to a variety of challenging projects

SUMMARY

  • Software development skills including but not limited to HTML5/ CSS3 / JavaScript / ReactJS / Node.js / C#/ ASP.NET/ Shell Script / SQL/ Java / jQuery / WordPress and many other computer coding languages
  • Participated in Agile/Interactive Development Projects and understood development life cycle (SDLC)
  • Excellent time management skills, successfully delivering on operational and project tasks concurrently
  • Knowledgeable in business process re-engineering with innovative approaches to drive out solutions
  • Excellent people skills, collaborating with teams to drive out solutions and arrive a tactical decision

PROJECTS

ReactJS Project for Concert Ticket Application

  • Developed application to show BTS concert information, including ticket prices and available discounts; dynamic display design included concert time, date, and location based on Google Maps
  • Environment: Visual studio Code, React, Surge

C# & ASP.Net Project for E-Shop Application

  • Created online shopping mall, utilizing DB connection including CRUD technique from MS SQL; completed secure admin management pages, as well as integration of Google OAuth authentication for customers, plus individual order history
  • Environment : Visual studio 2017, SQL server 2017, ADO .NET and ASP .NET

Diploma - Computer Programmer
